tool_description: Sends notifications to taxpayers and internal users about registration status, compliance issues, document requirements, and system updates.

recipient_id.description: ID of notification recipient (taxpayer or internal user)

message_content.description: Main content of the notification message

error_messages: Recipient not found: No recipient found with the specified ID
Invalid delivery method: One or more delivery methods are not supported
Invalid priority level: Use one of [low, normal, high, urgent]
Message content too long: Notification message exceeds maximum length
Delivery failed: Could not deliver notification via specified methods
usage: Specify recipient ID, notification type, message content, and delivery methods. Optionally set priority and reference number. Tool sends notifications via specified channels.

notification_id.description: Unique identifier for the sent notification

delivery_status.description: Delivery status for each specified method
